title.rendered: Applicature’s Panel Discussion “Venture Capital vs. ICO” Taking Place in Silicon Valley

content.rendered:
“VC vs. ICO” is gathering venture capital investors and representatives from crypto hedge funds to gain insight into blockchain technology.

Where?

We are pleased to announce “VC vs. ICO,” a panel discussion for those seriously considering launching an Initial Coin Offering (ICO) to raise money for their startup instead of a traditional angle or VC series. The event will take place on February 28th, 2018 at BootUp Ventures (68 Willow Rd., Menlo Park, CA 94025).

Tickets are available at Eventbrite. Don’t forget to provide your ETH address at ticket form. Applicature ICO clients coinspark.io will give each attendee AirDrop worth $100!

VC vs. ICO

Our panel discussion will cover the pros and cons of one option vs. the other. Our panelists have been successful with both sides of the debate, and can share their tips, processes, and pitfalls.

More than 1,500 ICOs have been created as of February 2018. The total valuation of all cryptocurrency has reached $320 billion today. If you had invested $100 in Bitcoin in 2011, that Bitcoin would be worth over $2.5 million today.

This event aims to elucidate our investigations and observations regarding different types of ICO launches and venture capital campaigns. Our leading professionals in blockchain technology will share their experiences and constructive ideas. This event will be profitable for VC owners curious about crypto investments, crypto hedge funds investing in ICO companies, industry leaders (enterprises) and startup entrepreneurs looking for blockchain solutions to fund their idea, developers curious about blockchain development, and so on.

What Will You Learn?

Take a look at the main panel discussion offerings, including but not limited to:

  • analyzing ICO projects as a trend going forward
  • comparing ICO and VC
  • ICO investing and problem-solving
  • understanding whether ICO projects can surpass VCs
  • favorite ICOs
  • thoughts about VC investments in ICOs
  • the most successful startup profiles
  • capital for launching your own ICO

In addition to traditional discussions, those attending will have the opportunity to learn more about marketing campaigns for ICO projects, including Google Analytics, Bay Area social networking influencers, and more.

Who Are the Speakers?

We’re excited to present our top speakers at the panel discussion:

  • Miko Matsumura, Founder, Evercoin Exchange, Venture Partner BitBull Capital
  • Ashmeet Sidana, Chief Engineer at Engineering Capital
  • Svyatoslav Sedov, Founder of The First International Incubator
  • Salil Pradhan, Venture Partner at Draper Nexus Ventures
  • Michael Sofaer, CTO at Brian Kelly Capital Management
  • Svyatoslav Sedov, Founder of The First International Incubator
  • Fred Tanada, Finance and Investments at Draper Dragon Digital Assets Fund
  • Mykyta Safronenko, Applicature moderator

For further information, please visit the meetup website: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/venture-capital-vs-ico-tickets-43278077896.
